description:
go.net/websocket: drop old versions of the protocol

Most modern web browsers support RFC6455, so it's okay to drop older versions.
Fixes issue 5628.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.net

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, ukai@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

lgtm
thanks!

return error if unsupported version is specified in config.Version?
